state_description: This screen allows users to manage application permissions related to privacy on their Mac. Users can view and control permissions for various system features and applications, ensuring their privacy is maintained.

enables.name: Manage Application Permissions
enables.description: View and adjust permissions for applications accessing system features.

enables.name: View Recent Items Lists
enables.description: Access and manage the list of recent items used by applications.

enables.name: Manage Safari Permissions
enables.description: View and control permissions specific to Safari.

enables.name: Manage Wi-Fi Networks
enables.description: View and manage permissions related to Wi-Fi networks.

enables.name: Adjust Accessibility Permissions
enables.description: View and modify accessibility permissions for applications.

enables.name: Adjust Automation Permissions
enables.description: View and modify automation permissions for applications.

enables.name: Adjust Camera Permissions
enables.description: View and modify camera access permissions for applications.

enables.name: Adjust Desktop Folder Permissions
enables.description: View and modify permissions for accessing the desktop folder.

enables.name: Adjust Documents Folder Permissions
enables.description: View and modify permissions for accessing the documents folder.

enables.name: Adjust Downloads Folder Permissions
enables.description: View and modify permissions for accessing the downloads folder.

enables.name: Adjust Full Disk Access Permissions
enables.description: View and modify full disk access permissions for applications.

enables.name: Adjust Input Monitoring Permissions
enables.description: View and modify input monitoring permissions for applications.

enables.name: Adjust Microphone Permissions
enables.description: View and modify microphone access permissions for applications.
